subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce scored 24 points and 10 assists, and the Boston Celtics (8-9) held the Magic to 8 points in the fourth quarter to win in Orlando, 91-83.
snippet: Paul Pierce scored 24 points and 10 assists, and the Boston Celtics (8-9) held the Magic to 8 points in the fourth quarter to win in Orlando, 91-83.
